data.message: Thank you so much for keeping it real on BET even though you will lose fans!  You put the truth before your finances and that takes a man of integrity.  We are in danger of losing our freedom and it is not just minorities that will suffer; it's everyone that is not wealthy!  The moron's supporters (especially the poor ones) will suffer just as greatly as black and brown people.  His base has been duped and are so blinded by hatred that they cannot see the broader picture.  Again, thank you for doing what you do!

replies.message: It's not the truth tho, it's a brainwashed leftist agenda. You have to be really thick to buy into that bullshit.
